name: Combat Disc
description:
Combat disc is a small arena shooter made by me and Missmien for the disc-room game-jam. 

The game itself is a 1 vs 1 arena shooter were both players have certain amount of lives and first to 0 loses.

The game is played with controllers. I tested with Xbox controllers but other controllers should work too if not elt me now in the comments. 

For questions, feedback or anything else you can comment on this page or send us a message through itch or twitter linked below.

https://twitter.com/VrLaurens  

https://twitter.com/miss_Mien

https://itch.io/profile/missmien
